ansDescription.text:
Explanation:  

Let us consider that x be the missed number.

Since x is a positive number, the sum of the first ‘n’ natural numbers including x should be greater than 42.

Note:  Sum of first ‘n’ natural numbers n ×(n+1)2

If we take the sum for first 9 natural numbers= (9 × 10)2= 45, (Nearest sum to 45, since sum of first 8 natural numbers would be 36 and that of first 10 would be 55)

Thus, 45 – x = 42

x = 3.

Answer (3)

title.description: The sum of first n natural numbers with one of them missed is 42. What is the number that was missed?

ansDescription.text:
Explanation:

Consider the given options:

234=281,

342=316,

432=49,

423=48

We can clearly say that 48< 49. So, option 3 can be eliminated from the above-considered options.

To compare the remaining 3 numbers, 281, 316, 49 we need to make base or power of each number the same. So we can try to make the bases same.

281 = 2 × 280 = 2 × (22)80 = 2 × 440

Thus, our remaining three numbers become 2 × 440, 316, 49.

Notice that the base and power of 440 is greater than 316 and 49, 440 is greater than both the other numbers. Then surely, 2 times 440 is also greater than both the other numbers.

Hence, 281 is the largest.

Answer (1)

title.description:
Which of the following numbers is the largest?

234,243,324,342,423,432

ansDescription.text:
Explanation:

Clearly x2 - 10x + 25=0

(x - 5)2 = 0

x = 5, 5, real and equal roots.

Answer (3)

title.description: Which of the following curve just touches the x-axis?

ansDescription.text:
Explanation:

x2+4y2+9z2 = 14x + 28y + 42z -147   x2+4y2+9z2 -14x-28y-42z+ 147=0

x2+4y2+9z2-14x-28y-42z+49 +49 +49=0   x2-14x+49 +4y2-28y + 49+ 9 z2-42z+49=0

(x2-14x+49) + (4y2-28y+49) + (9z2-42z+49)=0   (x-7)2 +(2y-7)2  (3 z -7)2 = 0

Thus, each term must be separately zero.

(x-7)²=0

Take square root on both sides,

(x-7)=0

x = 7

(2y-7)2=0

Take square root on both sides.

(2y-7)=0

y = 7/2

As, (3 z -7)2

Z = 7/3

x+2y+3z=7+2 72+373 = 7+7+7=21

Then, the value of x + 2y + 3z is 21

Answer (3)

title.description:
Consider the following equation  

x2 + 4y2 + 9z2 = 14x + 28y+42z + 147

Where, x, y and z are real numbers. Then the value of x+2y+3z is

ansDescription.text:
Explanation:

183 is divisible by 3

121 is divisible by 11

10201 is divisible by 101.  

Only 157 cannot be divided by any other number other than 1 or itself.

Answer: (3)

title.description: Which one of the following numbers is a prime number?

ansDescription.text:
s we know the rules of perfect squares.

No perfect square ends with an odd number of zeros.

Perfect squares (unit digit- 0, 1, 4, 5, 6, 9)

Through these rules we can easily discard the options.

As in A ten’s digit should be odd, in B ten’s digit should be 2 and in C there should be even number of zeros

So, A, B and C all are not perfect squares.

Answer: (4)

title.description:
Which of the following 7-digit numbers CANNOT be a perfect square?

A=45xyz26, B=2xyz175, C=xyz3310

ansDescription.text:
Explanation:  

The numbers which can be expressed as a square of a prime will have exactly 3 divisors. Like for 3^2, it has 3 divisors 1, 3,32.

So starting from22to 102, there will be 4 numbers.

Answer (1)

title.description: How many integers in the set 1,2,3,......,100have exactly 3 divisors?

ansDescription.text:
Explanation:

As, 2a×5b=500,500-2×2×5×5×5

2a×5b=22×53

a= 2 , b = 3

a+b = 5

Answer : (1)

title.description: If 2a×5b=500, and a and b are integers, then a + b is

ansDescription.text:
Explanation:

We know that:

40 = 1,   42 = 16,  

1/42 = 1/16, 41/2 = √4 = 2,  1/41/2 = 1/√4 = 1/2

So, 40+42+1/42 +41/2+1/41/2

= 1+16+ 1/16+2+ 1/2

= 19 + 1/16 + ½ = 19 + 9/16.

Answer (3)

title.description: 40+42+1/42 +41/2+1/41/2 equals

ansDescription.text:
Explanation:

A × B = 24 -------- (1)

B × C = 32 -------- (2)

C × D = 48 -------- (3)

Equation (1) divided by equation (2) gives as below:

A/C = 3/4------ (4)

Equation (3) multiplied by equation (4) gives as below:

A × D = 48×3/4 = 36  

= 62, a perfect square.

Alternate method: (A × D)=(A × B)× (C × D)(B × C )

=24 × 4832

 = 36 = 62, a perfect square.

Answer (2)

title.description: If A × B = 24, B × C = 32, C × D = 48, then A×D
